EXTRACTED VALUE: This is a game meant to be enjoyed, not induce frustration.
A solid game, and its Stunt Mode alone can be played for endless hours without a trace of boredom seeping in.
The player likenesses are fantastic and the overall presentation is wonderful.
Most importantly, the gameplay keeps what we love about Tiger and adds True Aiming, which calls for course management and a bit of strategy.
In closing, Dark Sector is a decent action shooting game that will appeal to those gamers who like a little thinking with their blasting.
For me, it doesnâ€™t get much better than this. Sure, it is a port, but a damn good one that will keep me busy for quite some time.
